product_name: Dynafit Ski Stopper TLT Vertical/Comfort Ski Brakes - 130mm
long_description: Dyanfit Ski Stopper TLT Vertical/Comfort ski brakes will help stop your skis from running away. Specifically designed for an integrated fit with the TLT Vertical and Comfort Bindings, sold separately. Dynafit Ski Stopper TLT Vertical/Comfort ski brakes fit skis with 130mm waists.
short_description: Dyanfit Ski Stopper TLT Vertical/Comfort ski brakes will help stop your skis from running away.
